articles.author: Steve Goldstein
articles.title: Why one strategist sees the S&P 500 climbing to 7,500 by the spring - MarketWatch
articles.description: An ‘unreasonable rally’ is developing thanks to technological advances and fiscal reforms
articles.content:
A Tuesday rally on slightly hotter-than-forecast inflation underscores where the momentum lies in the stock market these days: up, up and away.
To one strategist, however, the bullishness is not nea… [+396 chars]

articles.title: AI start-up Perplexity makes surprise $34.5bn bid for Google Chrome - BBC
articles.description: One technology investor called the $34.5bn offer a "stunt" that is much lower than Chrome's true value.
articles.content:
Artificial intelligence start-up Perplexity AI has made a surprise $34.5bn (£25.6bn) takeover bid for the world's most popular web browser, Google Chrome.
The three-year-old firm, whose backers incl… [+3235 chars]
